title: [Emerald Forest, Hillside Trail]
description: The steep hill necessitates a switchback, cutting just below a network of exposed tree roots.  A lizard lies motionless on a sunny rock.  Something inside a bush scuttles, then falls silent.

The steep hill necessitates a switchback, cutting just below a network of exposed tree roots.  A centipede marches slowly across a low, flat rock.  Something inside a bush scuttles, then falls silent.
